question: [Calm] Espanol: Calcula el area y el perimetro del triangulo con vertices (98, 42), (105, 42), (53, 56).

qas.question: [Calm] Espanol: Calcula el area y el perimetro del triangulo con vertices (98, 42), (105, 42), (53, 56).
[Check] Turkce: (98, 42), (105, 42), (53, 56) noktalarindan olusan ucgenin alanini ve cevresini hesapla. Provide only the area.
[Brief] Turkce: (98, 42), (105, 42), (53, 56) noktalarindan olusan ucgenin alanini ve cevresini hesapla. Provide only the perimeter.
